segments.text: I notice the sunlight streaming through the window, illuminating the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such an ordinary scene, yet the tension in the air is palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl standing there, palm open, waiting for a cookie—it’s heartwarming and alarming at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a twinge of dread thinking about the consequences if the boy falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t seem to realize the potential disaster behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t she see the water streaming down the cabinets?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the garden outside looks so peaceful, contrasting sharply with the chaos within.
segments.speaker: PAR
